column4: I need help to fix my wifi problem. I have a Atheros AR5001 that is not being recognized by ubuntu..
What do you mean not recognized?
i had windows move to linux and now i cant use my wifi
You need to elaborate. What is the output of:  lsmod|grep ath
This will tell you which module if any is loaded->  lsmod|grep ath
your command doesnt give a output in my computer
Ok, pastebin the output of lspci|grep -i ath
Please show the output of lspci|grep -i ath
Ok, now do sudo modprobe ath5k
while we were talking my wireless conection showed here..
Ah, where did you get the output from which command?
i appreciate your help.. but i need to go now..
can i talk to you tomorrow?
Just type my nick like you are doing now
hey man.. was you that was helping me last night about my wireless??
